intro.name: Isa Tlahuilxochitl
intro.motivation: I reshape stories, plays and poems for new audiences

description.text: My work focuses on translation and creative rewriting I adapt, demostrate, transform and translate. My work is genuine, fluid and voice-flexible. My primary creative target language is Mexican Spanish, but I also work in English or German for analysis, dramaturgy or collaborative projects. Each project gets a unique treatment. What do you have in mind?

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.tellme: Tell me about your text or send me something wild. I love unusual projects
